${modID}:AbstractCredRelic.NAME: Cybernetic
DESCRIPTIONS: Cybernetic cards can be implanted as permanent relics at #yRest #ySites for a credit cost equal to their energy cost. They cannot be upgraded.

${modID}:AbstractCyberRelic.NAME: Cybernetic Relic
DESCRIPTIONS: Cybernetic relics can be unimplanted at #yRest #ySites to gain their respective card.

${modID}:CarbideHandBonesRelic.NAME: Carbide Hand Bones
${modID}:CarbideHandBonesRelic.FLAVOR: Blue carbide merely dents where weak collagen would be smashed to bits.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCybernetic. ALL #yStrikes deal #b1.3x damage.

${modID}:ForceModulatorRelic.NAME: Force Modulator
${modID}:ForceModulatorRelic.FLAVOR: The emitted frequencies of your tiniest bits are synchronized with the standardized band for force emission.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCybernetic. Your #yAttacks are treated as HP Loss, ignoring enemy #yBlock.

${modID}:InflatableAxonsRelic.NAME: Inflatable Axons
${modID}:InflatableAxonsRelic.FLAVOR: Nanoscopic stents inflate the gossamer brain-threads that restrict the conduction of the will.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCybernetic. On odd turns, draw #b1 additional cards. On even turns, draw #b1 less card.

${modID}:StabilizerArmLocksRelic.NAME: Stabilizer Arm Locks
${modID}:StabilizerArmLocksRelic.FLAVOR: Chrome clasps fasten arm joints to emulate the stillness of unlife.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCybernetic. ALL #yGun cards deal #b2 additional damage.

${modID}:StartingCredits.NAME: Credits Wedge 3¢
DESCRIPTIONS: Grants #b3¢ towards installing #yCybernetic cards.

${modID}:CathedraWithRubyTraceryRelic.NAME: Ruby Cathedra
${modID}:CathedraWithRubyTraceryRelic.FLAVOR: Wavecrests of slag interrupt the plane geometry of the gigantic seat. The splats and claw feet are burned and disarranged.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCybernetic. At the start of combat, shuffle a #yPyrokinesis #yField into your draw pile. At the start of your turn, gain [E] draw #b1 additional card, and #yTransform #b1 card into a #yBurn.

${modID}:GiantHandsRelic.NAME: Giant Hands
${modID}:GiantHandsRelic.FLAVOR: For ages they dreamed, 'the hands must grow'. In the soft luster of a laboratory, the dream was realized.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCybernetic. At the start of your turn, reduce the cost of a random attack in your hand by #b1.

${modID}:HolographicVisageRelic.NAME: Holographic Visage
${modID}:HolographicVisageRelic.FLAVOR: Emulsion slicks on the cheek and laser light evokes pareidolic warmth.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCybernetic. Each combat, the first #b3 times you end your turn without playing any attacks, gain #b1 #yBuffer.

${modID}:HyperElasticAnkleTendonsRelic.NAME: Hyper-Elastic Ankle Tendons
${modID}:HyperElasticAnkleTendonsRelic.FLAVOR: Banded ropes of hydrogel are bundled into one.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCybernetic. Your #ySprints draw #b1 additional card.

${modID}:MedassistModuleRelic.NAME: Medassist Module
${modID}:MedassistModuleRelic.FLAVOR: Pneumatic applicators are hardwired to an intelligent control unit that dictates the injection of protean dyes into the veins.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCybernetic. At the start of your turn, put #b1 random Injector from your draw pile in your hand and #yModify it with #ySpringloaded.

${modID}:MotorizedTreadsRelic.NAME: Motorized Treads
${modID}:MotorizedTreadsRelic.FLAVOR: Triangular treads swathe the teeth of giant gears that turn to locomote. Their human has escaped the confines of bipedal motion.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCybernetic. Draw #b2 additional cards at the start of each turn. You cannot draw additional cards after.

${modID}:PrecisionForceLatheRelic.NAME: Precision Force Lathe
${modID}:PrecisionForceLatheRelic.FLAVOR: A magnetically-shielded headstock holds space in kinetic suspension while a force spindle spins and sharpens it to a point.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCybernetic. At the start of your turn, add a #yForce #yKnife+ to your hand.

${modID}:CommonCreditRelic.NAME: Credits Wedge 2¢
DESCRIPTIONS: Grants #b2¢ towards installing #yCybernetic cards.

${modID}:UncommonCreditRelic.NAME: Credits Wedge 3¢
DESCRIPTIONS: Grants #b3¢ towards installing #yCybernetic cards.

${modID}:RareCreditRelic.NAME: Credits Wedge 1¢
DESCRIPTIONS: Grants #b1¢ towards installing #yCybernetic cards.

${modID}:NachamsRibbonRelic.NAME: Nacham's Ribbon
${modID}:NachamsRibbonRelic.FLAVOR: A curtain of thrumming cables make a mantle for hunched shoulders.
DESCRIPTIONS: Grants a small chance to #yModify any card added to your deck.

${modID}:MagneticCoreRelic.NAME: Magnetic Core
${modID}:MagneticCoreRelic.FLAVOR: Laminated metal is bound as concentric spheres, softening magnetic eddies and powering near-field orbits.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCybernetic. Reduce the cost of #yPowers by #b1. Whenever you play a #yPower, apply #b1 #yPulsed to a random enemy.

${modID}:PrecisionNanonFingersRelic.NAME: Precision Nanon Fingers
${modID}:PrecisionNanonFingersRelic.FLAVOR: Fullerene finger extensors splay like fashionable court nails. Their girths are shrunk or unshrunk to task requirements by minuscule servos embedded in the webbing.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, apply #b1 additional stack of that debuff.

${modID}:ChiralRingsRelic.NAME: Chiral Rings
${modID}:ChiralRingsRelic.FLAVOR: Giant, flattened rings of hypercooled crysteel correlate their wearer to an astronomical body and serve as celestial equator, declination, and meridian.
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemies that deal you unblocked attack damage temporarily lose #b2 #yStrength at the start of your turn.

${modID}:AmaranthinePrismRelic.NAME: Amaranthine Prism
${modID}:AmaranthinePrismRelic.FLAVOR: A starless, triangular prism of black glass holds still.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] [E] at the start of your turn. Reduce this amount by #b1 whenever you climb #b10 floors (can be negative).

${modID}:OtherpearlRelic.NAME: Otherpearl
${modID}:OtherpearlRelic.FLAVOR: All-color nacre is hardened into an ontologically perfect shape; the mathematics of spheres are mere approximations.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a card #yModifies one or more other cards, add a random card of any color into your hand.

${modID}:ScrapCapeRelic.NAME: Scrap Cape
${modID}:ScrapCapeRelic.FLAVOR: From deep as stratum 29, this cape was knit from trash; a thousand years of history now draped across the ass.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a card is #yExhausted when played, gain #b1 #yPlated #yArmor.

${modID}:BoxOfCrayonsRelic.NAME: Box of Crayons
${modID}:BoxOfCrayonsRelic.FLAVOR: Wax is mixed in dye and moulded to the shape of styli. Together they sample the iridescence of the world and offer the tools to expand it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose 1 of 20 cards to add to your deck.

${modID}:EatersCrestRelic.NAME: Eater's Crest
${modID}:EatersCrestRelic.FLAVOR: A miniature plastic kite proves an aristocrat scion.
DESCRIPTIONS: Grants #b3¢ towards installing #yCybernetic cards. Upon pickup, add a random rare #yCybernetic card to your deck.

${modID}:BiodynamicPowerPlantRelic.NAME: Biodynamic Power Plant
${modID}:BiodynamicPowerPlantRelic.FLAVOR: A microturbine skims hemopower off the circulation of blood and the chemical reactions therein.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yCybernetic. Whenever you gain HP, gain [E] next turn.

${modID}:BasicToolkitRelic.NAME: Basic Toolkit
${modID}:BasicToolkitRelic.FLAVOR: An array of tinkering utensils clang against tin: tweezers, a tiny hammer, pliers, inverted pliers, glass marbles, and three wrenches.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, randomly #yModify #b3 cards in hand to be #ySharp or #yReinforced.

${modID}:AdvancedToolkitRelic.NAME: Advanced Toolkit
${modID}:AdvancedToolkitRelic.FLAVOR: An array of tinkering utensils clang against carbide: voltmeter, polyjack, soldering knife, ion shield, circuitboard, and three spare vacuum tubes.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yBasic #yToolkit. At the start of each turn, #yModify #b2 random cards in hand with random #yMods.
